verses.name: Psalms 103:1
verses.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul: and all that is within me, bless his holy name.

verses.name: Psalms 103:2
verses.text: Bless the Lord, O my soul, and forget not all his benefits:

verses.name: Psalms 103:3
verses.text: Who forgiveth all thine iniquities; who healeth all thy diseases;

verses.name: Psalms 103:4
verses.text: Who redeemeth thy life from destruction; who crowneth thee with lovingkindness and tender mercies;

verses.name: Psalms 103:5
verses.text: Who satisfieth thy mouth with good things; so that thy youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

verses.name: Psalms 103:6
verses.text: The Lord executeth righteousness and judgment for all that are oppressed.

verses.name: Psalms 103:7
verses.text: He made known his ways unto Moses, his acts unto the children of Israel.
